ValidationRule.description: Ensures that user can only progress to next stage i.e. Contract or Discontinued
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Partnership', ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( StageName ) , 'Proposal'), NOT( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Contract') ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Discontinued') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress to the next stage which is Contract or mark opportunity as Discontinued.
